text:
special.
I don’t get why you took this day too. Especially after last year. Can you give me anything at all?
Message 3442 of 4024
I have hundreds of these pictures, all taken on the 4th of July. It is us, like it or not. I know you took every picture from AD's past and removed all
childhood memories from our house, but this is who we were as a family. So I'd love to see him for the fireworks tonight to remember.
Of course, I also understand today is your "Independence Day" with Kevin, but tbh, he doesn't even know AD apart from the few times you made
them eat together. So, I'd appreciate it if we could continue our Moyer family traditions and let you and Kevin just create your own.
Please let me know.
Sent:07/04/2024 at 06:38 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 07/04/2024 at 07:19 PM)
Subject:Re: July 4th
Attachments:July_4th.jpg (432 KB)
Message 3443 of 4024
We have plans. Thank you.
Sent:07/04/2024 at 07:21 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 07/04/2024 at 07:21 PM)
Subject:Re: July 4th
Message 3444 of 4024
Moyer plans or Christine and other people plans?
Sent:07/04/2024 at 07:22 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 07/04/2024 at 09:09 PM)
Subject:Re: July 4th
Message 3445 of 4024
Can we please chat?
He has history with me. I’ve been doing this with him for twelve years. You and Kevin are one year old and he has no association with you two or
whoever else you are adding to his life tonight.
May we please chat? This is important to me as a Dad
Sent:07/04/2024 at 07:25 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 07/04/2024 at 09:08 PM)
Subject:Re: July 4th
